thread.section_title: Balmoral Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: First choice for future visits
thread.title_full: First choice for future visits - Review of Balmoral Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rachel H
title: First choice for future visits
text:
I stayed here with my mum for a weekend away christmas present we had received, first trip to Paris.
The hotel is in a great location and is walkable to many attractions with it being just off on a side street giving you the added benefit of quiet nights.
The hotel has a lovely decor
All of the staff were so friendly and helpful putting our first visit and lack of French knowledge worries at ease.
The room was great with a nice bit ensuite and really good facilities.
The handy device provided in the room to help us out and about was a life saver and so unique! All hotels should provide this facility it really was a fantastic touch.
Breakfast was nice and a good spread to set you up for the day.
I really couldn't fault this place and would 100% recommend to anyone visiting Paris.
Would definitely return if we come back to Paris in the future
